pr.title: Create Pull Request
pr.description: Push branch and create a pull request for "{{taskTitle}}"

errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred while creating the pull request
errors.invalidBranchName: Branch name contains invalid characters. Use only letters, numbers, hyphens (-), underscores (_), and forward slashes (/).
errors.emptyTitle: Pull request title cannot be empty.

success.alreadyExists: A pull request already exists for this branch

hints.targetBranch: Leave empty to use the default branch
hints.prTitle: Leave empty to use the task title

discard.title: Discard Build
discard.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to discard all changes for "{{taskTitle}}"?
discard.warning: This will permanently delete the isolated workspace and all uncommitted changes. The task will be moved back to Planning status.

mergePreview.branchDivergedDetail: Branch has diverged - AI will resolve
mergePreview.commitsBehind_one: The main branch has {{count}} new commit since this worktree was created.
mergePreview.commitsBehind_other: The main branch has {{count}} new commits since this worktree was created.
mergePreview.aiWillResolve: AI will automatically merge these conflicts when you click Stage Changes.

stagedSuccess.title: Changes Staged Successfully
stagedSuccess.commitMessageHint: Edit as needed, then copy and use with {{command}}
stagedSuccess.step1: Open your project in your IDE or terminal
stagedSuccess.step2: Review the staged changes with {{statusCommand}} and {{diffCommand}}

workspaceMessages.noWorkspaceHint: No isolated workspace was found for this task. The changes may have been made directly in your project.
workspaceMessages.changesStagedHint: This task's changes have been staged in your main project{{date}}.
workspaceMessages.cleanupHint: This will delete the isolated workspace and mark the task as complete.
